DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your tenant's service announcement messages on behalf of the signed-in user. Messages may include information about new or changed features.
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read your tenant's service announcement messages on your behalf. Messages may include information about new or changed features.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your tenant's service announcement messages, without a signed-in user. Messages may include information about new or changed features.
